{"blocks":[{"key":"b1btk","text":"After transfer to Columbus, export images from Columbus (Using “Single Plane Tiff” option) to your computer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9p1ld","text":"Remove all accessory files and left each folder just with images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnb9s","text":"Rename the “Tiles” folder to “TimepointBegin” (if the folder is relative to 0H) or “TimepointEnd” (if the folder is from any other timepoint).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvqa7","text":"Create an folder for each timepoint and put inside just “TimepointEnd” (the actual timepoin) and “TimepointBegin” (0H timepoint) folders. “TimepointBegin” will be the same for all “TimepointEnd”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
